text: Oh Jerusalem, Jerusalem, kun he bhabobadi khan ke morai diye aru tumikhan usorte ahile pathor pora mari kene pathai diye. Moi kiman itcha korise tumikhan laga bacha khan ke eke logote rakhibole nimite jineka ekta murgi tai laga bacha khan ke pakhi nichete rakhe. Kintu tumikhan etu itcha nakore.
